process.title: How it works?
process.s1_desc: Send us your cargo details and receive a competitive offer.
process.s2_desc: Your goods arrive at our Miami warehouse or we pick them up.
process.s3_desc: Air or ocean freight with real-time tracking included.
process.s4_desc: Customs clearance and final delivery to your doorstep.

sections.s1_text: At Ocean Sigma Export Corp, we value your privacy. We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and company details when you use our contact forms, create a client account, or request quotes for logistics services.
sections.s2_text: We use your information strictly for operational and commercial purposes, such as: processing and managing your shipments, tracking, and export orders; direct communication regarding the status of your services or incidents; and compliance with international customs regulations and billing.
sections.s3_text: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We only share data with third parties (such as port authorities, customs agencies, or ground transport partners) when strictly necessary for the successful execution of the contracted logistics service.
sections.s4_text: We implement technical and organizational security protocols to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
sections.s5_text: You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal information from our records, except for data we are required to retain by fiscal or customs laws.

sections.s1_text: By accessing and using Ocean Sigma Export Corp's services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, we recommend not using our export and logistics services.
sections.s2_text: Our services are intended exclusively for legitimate commercial use. It is strictly prohibited to use our infrastructure for fraudulent activities, smuggling, or any action that violates international trade laws.
sections.s3_text: All content, trademarks, logos (including Ocean Sigma), and software present on this site are the exclusive property of Ocean Sigma Export Corp and are protected by applicable intellectual property laws.
sections.s4_text: Ocean Sigma is not responsible for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages derived from the use of this website, transport delays due to force majeure, or the inability to use our digital services.

compliance.title: Compliance & Ethics
compliance.subtitle: We operate under the strictest standards of international legality and commercial transparency.

sections.s1_text: We strictly adhere to international trade regulations, including those of the US Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC) and local customs laws in every jurisdiction where we operate.
sections.s2_text: We maintain strict 'Know Your Customer' (KYC) policies and transaction monitoring to prevent the use of our logistics infrastructure for illicit activities, money laundering, or terrorist financing.
sections.s3_text: Our employees and business partners are required to act with integrity, honesty, and transparency in all operations. We reject any form of bribery or corruption in our supply chains.
sections.report_text: If you are aware of any irregularity or violation of our compliance policies, please report it immediately.

sections.s1_text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us improve your experience, remember your preferences, and understand how you interact with our content.
sections.s2_sub1_text: Necessary for the basic functioning of the site, such as secure navigation and access to protected areas.
sections.s2_sub2_text: Allow us to count visits and traffic sources to measure and improve our site's performance. All information is anonymous.
sections.s3_text: You can configure your browser to reject all cookies. However, please note that some site functions may not work properly without them.
